text: Sadhankeri (litrally means Resource Lake)also known as The lungs of Dharwad city is in northwest Dharwad, it is one of the largest neighborhoods, and is a residential locality and also the one of the greenest places in Dharwad. Many well-known landmarks are in Sadhankeri. ==References== Category:Settlements in Karnataka
title: Sadhankeri, Dharwad
